attributes.action: I Request that the PM explain what is happening to some EPetitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems surprising to me that some e-petitions seem to be just disappearing.  Neither appearing on the rejected area or open area.

This is even more disgusting than the soviet style big brother legislation being implemented.  Could the PM please give a statement to the country as to what exactly this site has to do democracy when some questions just disappear!

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
